title: To Help You Understand - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Gender Bender   Mature   Psychological   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Body Swap   Cold Love Interests   Depression   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Love at First Sight   Marriage of Convenience   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Royalty   Slow Romance   Suicides
author: Lee Bora   이보라
description:
The royal family is burdened with debt. To pay it off, they send their daughter Violet to be betrothed to Winter, the bastard son of a loaded Duke family.

Violet falls in love with Winter on first sight. But Winter's not taken with her.

Years later, Violet decides to divorce him...but then she finds that they've swapped bodies.

How did this happen!? And will they be able to change back!?>
